Sentencas: The use of pyrochlore oxides as solid-oxide fuel cells (SOFC) cathodes is a promising and rather unexplored alternative.
Titulo: Evaluation of the R2RuMnO7 pyrochlores as cathodes in solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The presence of some cationic disorder in pyrochlores promotes the Frenkel-defect formation responsible of a high-ionic conductivity in these compounds.
Titulo: Evaluation of the R2RuMnO7 pyrochlores as cathodes in solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Moreover, the use of the suitable transition metals at the B position gives rise to an adequate electronic conductivity constituting disordered pyrochlores as mixed, ionic-electronic conductors.
Titulo: Evaluation of the R2RuMnO7 pyrochlores as cathodes in solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this work, we have synthesized and characterized a new family of pyrochlore oxides with the formula R2MnRuO7 (R=Tb, Dy, Ho, Er, Tm, Yb, Lu and Y) using the smallest rare-earth cations in order to promote disorder in the crystal lattice.
Titulo: Evaluation of the R2RuMnO7 pyrochlores as cathodes in solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Polycrystalline samples were prepared by a soft chemistry procedure involving citrates of the different metal ions, followed by thermal treatments in air or O-2 pressure.
Titulo: Evaluation of the R2RuMnO7 pyrochlores as cathodes in solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: They are all cubic, space group Fd (3) over barm.
Titulo: Evaluation of the R2RuMnO7 pyrochlores as cathodes in solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The Rietveld-refinement from neutron powder diffraction data at room-temperature evidences that the cation disorder (distribution of Mn between A and B positions) increases when the size of R decreases.
Titulo: Evaluation of the R2RuMnO7 pyrochlores as cathodes in solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This disorder is accompanied by an increment of the oxygen-vacancy concentration due to the reduction of Mn4+ at the B position to Mn2+ at the A position.
Titulo: Evaluation of the R2RuMnO7 pyrochlores as cathodes in solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The obtained compounds display a semiconductor-like behavior with a maximum conductivity of 8.9 S cm(-1) for Er2MnRuO7 at 900 degrees C. Moreover, the measured thermal expansion coefficients are in the range of 9.8-10.7 x 10(-6) K-1 between 100 and 900 degrees C that perfectly match those of the usual electrolytes, YSZ, LSGM or CGO.
Titulo: Evaluation of the R2RuMnO7 pyrochlores as cathodes in solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The obtained results present the R2MnRuO7 pyrochlores as alternative cathodes for IT-SOFCs.
Titulo: Evaluation of the R2RuMnO7 pyrochlores as cathodes in solid-oxide fuel cells
